name: Magic Mayhem (ENDOBLANCE)
description:
Made for Brackeys game jam 2021.2

If oyu're wearing headphones, you might wanna turn it down a little...

In Magic Mayhem you play as... well... Some kind of blob that posesses magic abilities. You don't know why, you don't know how, but you need to defeat an evil entity that lives deep down in an underground dungeon. 

The only force that can destroy the uncoloured evil are colourful spells. Lucky for us, the main character blob thingy is a magical grandmaster in colourful magic!


In case you haven't read the in-game how to section, here are the controls:

•Movement: WASD/Arrow keys

•Run: Shift

•Aim: Mouse

•Shoot: LMB/X/Z

For any further details, consult mentioned how to section in-game.

Thank you for taking the time to play this!

As mentioned at the top of the page, this game has been developed over the span of one week for Brackeys game jam 2021.2.

I had a lot of fun and... Lotter of stress, but sadly the time frame means that there are a lot of bugs... If something doesent seem right, refreshing the page will often fix it but feel free to let me know of any bugs!

Thank you for reading & playing!
